rows.label: bf11050100_0010
rows.name: What did you just say? Baltrich?

rows.label: bf11050100_0020
rows.name: Homeropa, the capital of Shiya, is destroyed...?

rows.label: bf11050100_0030
rows.name: No, I said it was annihilated, Your Holiness Radaria.

rows.label: bf11050100_0040
rows.name: To think that such a thing could happen...

rows.label: bf11050100_0050
rows.name:
Your Holiness...
Forgive me for saying so, but you're a terrible actor.

rows.label: bf11050100_0060
rows.name: You don't look surprised at all.

rows.label: bf11050100_0070
rows.name:
A very believable rumor has been
making the rounds among the cardinals.

rows.label: bf11050100_0080
rows.name: It concerns Marveni, the man you just made a Deacon...

rows.label: bf11050100_0090
rows.name:
...that Homeropa's destruction
was the work of his Blade.

rows.label: bf11050100_0100
rows.name:
With such extraordinary power,
is it really wise to...

rows.label: bf11050100_0110
rows.name: No matter whose power was behind it,

rows.label: bf11050100_0115
rows.name:
it only serves to increase
the glory of the Acedia Holy See.

rows.label: bf11050100_0120
rows.name: The Father, God, will surely be delighted...

rows.label: bf11050100_0130
rows.name: Do you believe you can control such power?

rows.label: bf11050100_0140
rows.name: If he fails, I'll make him take the blame.

rows.label: bf11050100_0150
rows.name: I appreciate your report, Cardinal Baltrich. Return to your duties.
